text: 14.15 1 Ko 8.11-13 Anɨb ak nep nɨbi tap ñɨŋeb okok monmon ñɨbem, mam olap nɨŋɨd, tap asɨkep ñɨbebɨm agɨl gos nɨgup ak, tap anɨgɨl ñɨbɨm ak nop gem mɨdtep ma gup. Nɨbi anɨgɨl nɨm, mam nop mapen ma lɨpɨm. Klays nop nen kumak, anɨb ak tek nɨbi tap monmon ñɨbem ne apyap pakɨl kul gɨnɨmuŋ tek lup ak ma gɨnɨmɨb.
